comments.author: Dowper_
comments.body: I have this error when starting the mining bat:05-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] OPTION mallob-endpoint SET TO https://dnx.eu.ekapool.com05-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] OPTION multi-gpu ACTIVATED05-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] OPTION no-cpu ACTIVATED05-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] MULTI-GPU ENABLED05-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] CUDA RUNTIME: 11.205-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] CUDA DRIVER:¬† 12.005-03-2023 14:30:04 [INFO] FOUND 1 INSTALLED GPU(s)05-03-2023 14:30:04 [GPU 0] 26:00 NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti 12281 MB (8.9) ADJ = 1.30000005-03-2023 14:30:04 [MALLOB] REGISTER WORKER: FAILEDAny suggestions on how to fix this "Register worker" error?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Dowper_ on March 05, 2023, 12:33:12 PMAny suggestions on how to fix this "Register worker" error?visit sitehttps://miningpoolstats.stream/dynexcoinfind some large mining poolsRead the instructions for Windows and Linux in the section getting_startedhttps://dnx.mineradnow.space/#getting_startedhttps://dynex.neuropool.net/#getting_startedCheck your video card driver versionIn most cases, after studying this information, you will find the cause.Mining pools have discord or telegram where you can quickly find help.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on March 17, 2023, 01:11:18 PMerror[MALLOB] REGISTER WORKER: FAILEDUpdate ¬†miner DynexSolve Version 2.2.5DynexSolve PoUW CPU & GPU MinerMining Software Supporting DynexSolve algorithmCUDA (Nvidia GPUs) (AMD and Intel are being supported by commercial miners)Windows, Linux & HiveRequires libcurl (Ubuntu: sudo apt install libcurl-dev)Require open ports 80 (http) and FTPRequires 1 CPU core for each GPU, preferably newer versions with AES supporthttps://github.com/dynexcoin/Dynex/releases/tag/DynexSolve-v225

comments.author: theorjinale
comments.body: all errorr /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.32' not found (required by ./dynexsolve)please standard version.upgrade problem

comments.author: styleshifter
comments.body: I have added DynexSolve to my app/website.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: COMMUNITY VOTE - HASHRATE DISTRIBUTION ¬†"The community has decided: On 7/7/2023 we asked to vote on potential measurements: Most voted for an upper bound of 40% of the total network-hash-rate on pools. We appreciate your contributions and mindfulness and will take this majority vote as a decision. All pools are therefore required to implement measurements to limit their hash-rate share to a maximum of 40.00% of the overall network. Albeit pool operators are free to decide on how to enforce this requirement, we also have prepared code snippets which can be used for simplicity. The planned network upgrade on July 27th, 13:00 UTC is an optimal deadline for these measurements to be implemented. Healthy hash-rate distribution is a core requirement for any successful blockchain, we would like to thank everyone for being supportive and understanding."https://t.me/dynextg/46388

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Dynex v.2.2.2.dDynex Version 2.2.2.d containing:dynexd (daemon) compatible with DynexSolvesimplewallet (CLI wallet)connectivy_toolwalletd (wallet daemon)Min. 2GB HDD and 8GB RAM recommendedPlease open ports 17333 and 17336 which are required for p2p connections of the nodeRelease notes 2.2.2.d:Updated checkpointsFix: hanging synchttps://github.com/dynexcoin/Dynex/releases/tag/Dynex_2.2.2.dlinux and mac os

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Guys, I wrote earlier that old versions of miners will not work on DNX, you need to update before October 20, there is information above on how to do this.If you haven't already, be sure to update your miners to the latest version (OZM 1.2.5 or SRB 2.3.9) to ensure the highest quality PoUW.https://t.me/Info4atlanin/9279
